title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC Review
description: This RFC outlines the gathering and documentation of detailed requirements for the self-healing infrastructure system. Included are functional and non-functional requirements, target environments, stakeholder needs, and a preliminary list of advanced materials and IoT sensors to be used. This task is currently in a DRAFT state and awaiting feedback or further refinement. Please review and provide comments or suggestions for improvement.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flows, and communication protocols.

title: Select Advanced Materials and Sensors for Self-Diagnosis and Self-Repair Infrastructure
description: Conduct thorough research and evaluation of advanced materials and IoT sensors suitable for self-diagnosis and self-repair capabilities. Identify the most promising options based on factors such as durability, self-healing properties, cost, availability, compatibility with the overall system architecture, environmental impact, and prioritize sustainable and eco-friendly materials and sensors. Provide a comprehensive report detailing the findings, including recommended materials/sensors and their rationale. Include potential challenges and mitigation strategies in the report.

title: Develop Self-Diagnosis and Self-Repair Algorithms
description: Design and implement algorithms for self-diagnosis and self-repair based on sensor data and system health monitoring.

title: Build Data Management and Analytics Platform
description: Design and develop a platform for collecting, storing, and analyzing sensor data and system health data.

title: Develop User Interfaces and Dashboards
description: Design and implement user interfaces and dashboards for monitoring system health, configuring self-healing parameters, and visualizing data.
dependencies: Build Data Management and Analytics Platform

title: Implement Security and Access Controls (Revised)
description: Update the description to emphasize the critical role of security in the SelfHealingInfrastructure project: Design, develop, and implement a robust and comprehensive security system. This will involve implementing industry-standard authentication, authorization, data encryption, secure communication protocols (such as OAuth2, TLS/SSL), and access controls. The security strategy will cover all aspects of the system, from physical infrastructure to software components and data transmission. Ensure adherence to best practices while incorporating regular reviews and updates to address emerging threats and vulnerabilities. Collaborate with other team members during the implementation process, and maintain clear documentation for future reference. Upon completion, perform thorough testing and integration checks before moving to the next phase.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the self-healing infrastructure system.

title: Conduct System Testing and Validation
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and system tests, to validate the self-healing capabilities and overall system functionality.
dependencies: Build Data Management and Analytics Platform

title: Prepare Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for system administrators, maintainers, and end-users.
